channel.title: jira.namics.com
channel.description: An XML representation of a search request

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3043] Produktbilder-Attribute
item.description:
Um eine optimale Performance und optimale Darstellung der Produktbilder für die mobile Seite zu erhalten, wäre es wichtig, das die Produktbilder bei den Poduktlisten immer mit den Attributen versehen sind, mit den entsprechenden korrekten Werten für:

  • width
  • height
item.summary: Produktbilder-Attribute

comments.comment:
Rafael,
can this be done for the CH go-live?
Yes, or in-between AT and CH.
Added Width and Height (83x110px) to all product lists

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2872] weitere anzeigen - needs to be expanded 7 times until I can see all accessories of product 261100
item.description:
7 times (!!!) I had to expand with „ weitere anzeigen“ until I can see all accessories of product 261100
Change the Button to “Alle Anzeigen” und make that with one time click it expands to all !
(the existing solution is not practicable – it displeases users)
item.summary: weitere anzeigen - needs to be expanded 7 times until I can see all accessories of product 261100

comments.comment: please see attached
This currently works as designed. Will discuss with Florian whether anything should be done about this.
Alle Anzeigen is not an option. Always show the next 10.
@Nando: Can we assign this to Cornel? Because Laurent will not be able to solve that as it is a FF related change.

- It's not a FactFinder issue but a front end issue.
- Needs to be changed to both similar products / ähnliche Produkte and accessories / Zubehör on the detail page.
- Assigning to Beat
pagesize increased to 10, can be tested after next deployment of release 1.1.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2814] CMS: Allow placement of Carousel on Home Page
item.description: Please adapt the home page, so that it is possible to also place a carousel in the second content slot (#12 as per spec here: https://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/P100-Home)
item.summary: CMS: Allow placement of Carousel on Home Page

comments.comment:
Hi Dishan,

can you please take care of this change request. Thank you in advance. Dean.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2806] Some properties need to be country-specific
item.description:
For CH/IT launch

The properties for the following items need to be country- and language-specific, instead of just language-specific:

  • copyright note in the footer
  • checkout process -> order review page: the properties for all the checkbox labels above the "continue checkout" button
  • registration forms (B2B and B2C), at the end of the form, all checkbox labels

Furthermore, please make the "© 2014" dynamics, so that the year is always the current one.
item.summary: Some properties need to be country-specific

comments.comment:
Hi Pascal,

can you please take care of this change request. Thank you in advance. Dean.

Dear Dean,

This needs to be in place for AT.

Update - discussed with Oana: there was a misunderstanding. This CR is still for IT/CH - however the property was wrong, but this was fixed now: https://jira.namics.com/browse/DISTRELEC-2760?focusedCommentId=529452#comment-529452
Hi Pascal can you please also make an estimation for this change. Thank you.

Hi Dishan can you please also make an estimation for this change and start with the implementation.

Thank you.
This change will take about 1.5 PD
done
If you override the copyright property, make sure to use "{0}" to display the year.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2688] Detail Page Tech Attributes: "search for similar products" should be inactive if no attributes selected
item.description:
On the detail page it is possible to search for similar products based on selected attributes of the "technical attributes".

Currently this button is always active.

Changes:

  • If no attributes are selected, the button should be inactive and no search should be possible.
  • A front-end validation on the button should be added (style: red tooltip layer) indicating that at least one attribute must be selected for a search for similar products. The tooltip should show if the user clicks on the inactive button.
item.summary: Detail Page Tech Attributes: "search for similar products" should be inactive if no attributes selected

comments.comment:
Hi Beat,

can you please take care of this change request and give an estimation of the effort.

Thank you in advance. Dean.

estimated effort: FE 0.5d
open question: what does 'inactive' look like for this button?

Hi Nando,

any suggestions?

Dominic,
do we have a pattern for an inactive primary button, or can we derive one from the styleguide?
Yes we do, please see attached screenshot.

Hi Beat,

please implement this adaption. Thank you.
implemented, can be tested after deployment.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2386] Webuse D attributes not displayed under Technical Attributes
item.description:
Webuse D attributes have to be displayed under Technical Attributes as described in C38-TechnicalAttributes by Raphael in his post from April 22:
"We differ:

•WebUse A attributes
•WebUse B attributes
•WebUse C attributes
•WebUse D attributes

Just WebUse A attributes are searchable. All other categories are just visible.
The order of the attributes is:

1.WebUse category from A to D
2.In in each WebUse category they get sorted by an order number from 000 to 999"

It is however correct that we only show webuse A-C in the facet search.

Example of D-Attributes:

  • ArtNo 100001 (14048007), Attribute Calc_Temperaturbereich_°C and Beschreibung_lov should be displayed.
  • ArtNo 822312 (16825001), Attribute Ausfuehrung_lov, IEC_Klimakategorie_lov, kennfarbe_colours
  • ArtNo 630677 (13390226), Attribute LeistungMax_W
item.summary: Webuse D attributes not displayed under Technical Attributes

comments.comment:
There is conflicting inforamtion on this.
My understanding is that after April it was decided to show Webuse A, B and C, but not D.

See this comment https://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/C38-TechnicalAttributes?focusedCommentId=56069463#comment-56069463
and this one: https://jira.namics.com/browse/DISTRELEC-506?focusedCommentId=465827&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:comment-tabpanel#comment-465827

Please clarify with Raphael and Florian.

Hallo Nando,

Both links are related to the facet search and are correct.

In summary:
Webuse A-C: Relevant for facet search
Webuse A-D: Relevant for product information

Îf this fix needs to much effort let me know and we'll implement a fix within PIM to convert all D attributes into C (not perfect but we'll live).

Thanks in advance.

Pascal,
I'm not sure maybe there was a misunderstanding about whether D attributes should be displayed on the detail page. Can we include D as well?

Hi Nando,

yes it's not a bug, all specs and discussions only consider A to C. but we have an open CR where we can add this request (DISTRELEC-1559) it's out of scope for release 1.
Actually we can't put the workaround in place from PIM as it would create issues in the current shop (family view impact).
Dean, I linked this to another CR that is deferred to a next Release (after go-live).

Hi Oana,

I suggest that we defer this change like the DISTRELEC-1559, which can easily be implemented together.

Hi Cornel,

can you please make an estimation of the implementation effort for this change request.

Thank you in advance. Dean.

Estimation: 0.5 PD

Implementation information: see DistProductFeatureListPopulator

Hi Lukas,

can you pleas take care of this change. Thank you.
Why is this closed?

item.title: [DISTRELEC-1979] Order history data - Missing cost center & project info
item.description:
TS-24.78
user : distrelec.testing+2
order : 00000DC3
This is a B2C customer. Maybe he should not have access to the cost & project info functionality. But he does.
Cost center and project data not displayed. See screen shot.
item.summary: Order history data - Missing cost center & project info

comments.comment:
@Nando: As far as I know, the B2C user can not see cost center & project number, right?
If yes than it was a bug in the checkout and Jean should not had the possibility to fill in this information.
You ar correct, Raphael. The B2C user should not be able to enter cost center and project number information in the order review page.
This bug is considered as change request since the requirements was not specified. The development team had no information, that the cost center & project number are not allowed for b2c customers.

Hi René,

can you please make an estimation of the required change?

Thank you.
No confirmation from Oana.

The fields are useless for B2C and Guestusers.
We should remove them.
As per Florian this should be reconsidered

Comment by Oana:
"Regarding 1979: if the fields and the logic can be done and deployed by next text (7th, 8th of January) I agree, if not, we should halt it. In Austria we do not have B2C, therefore we should concentrate on the what was specified."

Hold change request until after live going.
Must be done for CH/IT only.

Hi Dishan,

can you please take care of this change request. Thank you in advance. Dean.
The cost center and project number are now disabled for b2c and guest customers.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3119] Improve logging of CXF WebServices
item.description: Without any configuration changes CXF uses java.util.logging to log any messages. This should be changed to force CXF to use log4j instead.
item.summary: Improve logging of CXF WebServices

comments.comment: CXF configuration updated.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3192] VPE on list different than on Detail Page
item.description: The VPE on the list view seems to be static
item.summary: VPE on list different than on Detail Page

comments.comment: Packung à 20Stk shown as 1Stk in the list view

Another example:
http://www.distrelec.at/de/Batterie-LR6-AA-1-5-V-2600-mAh-Duracell-MN1500-PROCELL/p/16925820
vs
http://www.distrelec.at/search?q=Batterie+LR6%2FAA+1.5+V+2600+mAh

My suspicion is that the VPE on product lists is hard coded rather than dynamic to the product?
On the product detail page the "nameErp" of the SalesUnit is displayed if the attribute "name" is not set. This "relevant" logic was not implemented for the FACT-Finder export.
Ready to test after the next deployment.

/environment/env-hp-p-app-common/hybris/bin/custom/distrelecB2Binitialdata/resources/distrelecB2Binitialdata/import/project/contentCatalogs/distrelec_ATContentCatalog/webtrekk.impex
item.summary: Initial Webtrekk properties for CH/IT release

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3120] ProductFinder values stay disabled
item.description:
Some product finder values are disabled after unchecking another value.

Reason: when updating a product finder configuration, the FACT-Finder custom value "webuseAttributeCount" is not set to "-1".
item.summary: ProductFinder values stay disabled

comments.comment: Ready to test.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3094] Avoid saving models twice
item.description:
Some Models are persisted twice during PIM import. This should not be necessary.

Check the following converters:

  • ProductCOPunchOutFilterElementConverter
  • ProductCountryElementConverter
  • ProductElementConverter
  • ProductLineCountryElementConverter
  • ProductManufacturerCountryElementConverter
item.summary: Avoid saving models twice

comments.comment: Mentioned Converters checked and updated if necessary.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3093] EOL product not (100%) correctly indicated
item.description:
If the SalesStatus of a product changes to 60, we set an endOfLifeDate to that point in time (e.g. 05.02.2014 14:53:15).

The logic to redirect the user to the EOL CMS page (/de/Product%20EOL/cms/productEOL) is inaccurate. The redirect will first happen the next day.
=> between 05.02.2014 14:53:15 and 06.02.2014 00:00:00 the detail page will still be displayed.
item.summary: EOL product not (100%) correctly indicated

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3052] In vergleich form - weitere anzeige does not expand its frame - data overlapping
item.description:
AT webshop
user atmaindistrelec@gmail.com pwd at12345
in vergleich form we have :
Items 102537 and 912285. For item 912285 when you click on weitere anzeige for technical attributes the frame does not expand and data overlap. See screenshot.
item.summary: In vergleich form - weitere anzeige does not expand its frame - data overlapping

comments.comment: height gets adjusted again after clicking show more. done.
not ok. see new attachment

Jean, this was only fixed for the 1.1 (CH/IT) release, so it is not visible in the current live environment yet.
It will be testable on the 1.1 test system in the coming weeks, pending instructions.

Re-resolving this ticket.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3022] 'Distrelec AT Website' on each page
item.description:
Please note that the Welcome page title in the browser should become:

Ihr Online Shop für Elektronik | Distrelec AT

'Distrelec AT Website' on every page should become 'Distrelec AT'
item.summary: 'Distrelec AT Website' on each page

comments.comment:
The hybris standard is as follows:

Home Page:
{siteTitle} | {pageTitle}

All other pages:
{pageTitle} | {siteTitle}

The pageTitle of CMS pages can be maintained in the CMS cockpit.
The siteTitle is maintained in the HMC

For AT we changed the siteTitle 'Distrelec AT'

Oana,
this is resolved apart from the order of the two titles being different on the home page, currently in accordance with hybris standard, see comment above.

This could be changed for R1.1, please assign back to me if we should do so, otherwise please resolve.

Could you please change
Distrelec AT
into
Distrelec Österreich ?
done
Please redo this. On production we have now the old Distrelec AT

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2997] Layout issue on guest order process
item.description:
Checkboxes and descriptions are not in line at the guest user order form.

Browser: IE 8
URL: https://test.distrelec.at/login/checkout/register/guest
item.summary: Layout issue on guest order process

comments.comment: Layout issue of the screenshot is IE (probably 8) related.
fixed, can be tested after deployment.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2982] Download data from Cart - new article numbers instead of current ones
item.description:
TS-24.08
AT Shop
When you download data from the cart, you do not get current product numbers (Movex) but you get the future ones (SAP).
See the first column of screen shot.
item.summary: Download data from Cart - new article numbers instead of current ones

comments.comment: Seems to apply to all list download files (order history detail, favorite list, shopping list)
fixed
on 08/02/2014. Not solved. Still SAP codes.
As you can see in the attached screenshot, the correct code is beeing used. This bug will be fixed for CH / IT (trunk). On test.distrelec.ch v1.0.6 is still live.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2971] Vergleich form - Price not displayed
item.description:
No script
Webshop AT
No user
3 Products are set into the comparaison form : 763751, 652665, 912285
Product 763751 has no price under its title "LED Farbdrucker".
The 2 others have a price under the title.
Also lables are different. 763751 has "Ihr Preis". 652665 and 912285 have Listenpreis. Why?
See screen shot.
item.summary: Vergleich form - Price not displayed

comments.comment:
The problem is that the first product 763751 has a special price.
I'll check that, why the price is not displayed properly.
the price of the printer is marked as special price, that's the reason why it's "Ihr Preis" instead of "Listenpreis" that's the same logic as on the detailpage.

I think if there are special prices a list price should also be defined.

snippet of product-compare-list.jsp

<c:choose>
<c:when test="${not empty product.listPrice}">
<span class="price">
<span class="currency">${product.price.currencyIso}</span>
<format:price format="price" priceData="${product.price}" displayValue="${product.price.value}" />
</span>
</c:when>
</c:choose>
@Pascal: Do you know how you can fix that? because if there is a special price, the price is not a "list price" anymore. So in that case you just have a "your price".
the condition on the compare page, that only shows the price if there is a list price needs to be removed. If a product has a special price, at least with movex, it doesn't have a list price.

Dominic please make following changes on the product detail page to be consistent with the new requirement of movex price handling.

case 1 only listprice (see listprice.png): no change required

case 2 only special price (see only_specialprice.png): change label "Listenpreis" to "Ihr Preis" and align the price

case 3 listprice with specialprice (see specialprice_with_listprice.png): change label "Listenpreis" to "Ihr Preis"

if you need any instructions to change the prices on your local machine, skype me.
done

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2892] Ensure to not delete and recreate unchanged attributes
item.description:
In case a product has to be updated (hash has changed) we check each ProductFeature and...

  • delete attributes from DB that do not exist in XML anymore
  • insert attributes to DB that are new in XML
  • delete/insert attributes that have a changed value
  • DO NOTHING in case the value has not changed.

Ensure, that we really DO NOTHING in case the value has not change.
item.summary: Ensure to not delete and recreate unchanged attributes

comments.comment: Only implement if improvement is significant. Otherwise defer to later.

All root attributes have been deleted and re-created. This fix should gain some performance :-)

FlexiSearch used for testing:

select
    {pf.qualifier},
    {pf.modifiedtime}
from
    {ProductFeature as pf
    join product as p on {p.pk}={pf.product}
    join language as l on {l.pk}={pf.language}}
where
    {p.code} = '17002436'
    and {l.isocode} = 'de'
order by
    {pf.modifiedtime}

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3195] FE implementation
item.description:
FE needs to be updated to display Feedback Campaigns correctly.

New data structure of Feedback Campaigns:

searchPageData.feedbackCampaigns -->
[
{
"id":"14",
"category":"test",
"name":"test_ceberle_feedback1",
"feedbackTexts":{ "SearchResult_top":"\u003cdiv\u003eschöne grüsse vom FACT-Finder\u003c/div\u003e" },
"pushedProducts": --> Array of B2BProductData
},
{
"id":"15",
"category":"test",
"name":"test_ceberle_feedback2",
"feedbackTexts":{ "SearchResult_top":"\u003cdiv\u003eEs gibt tolle QNAP Produkte\u003c/div\u003e" },
"pushedProducts": --> Array of B2BProductData
},
...
]
item.summary: FE implementation

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2889] Skip certain product features during PIM import
item.description:
There are some attributes that can be skipped from PIM import for two reasons:

a) some attributes are persisted in a typed attribute at product level (for FF export performance reasons). Therefore it is not required to import these attributes as ProductFeatures a second time.

  • ERP_Typ
  • ERP_ArtNr
  • articlenumber_num
  • 5547
  • titleproductline
  • reachreviewdate_law
  • shortdescription_shop_displayed
  • Bezeichnung_text
  • longdescription
  • promotionart_txt
  • calc_accessory_yn
  • seo_campaign_tag
  • seo_keywords
  • seo_keywordsA
  • seo_misspellings

b) Some of the attributes will never be used. Most probably David Froidevaux is able to remove them from the PIM export. If not, we should skip them during import.

Implementation hints:
I expect to have a backlist of attribute names that can be read and attached to the import context. Before importing an attribute, we check whether the attribute is blacklisted.

Effort: 1-2 md
item.summary: Skip certain product features during PIM import

comments.comment:
@David: There are some additional candidates to be skipped...

*Attribute Widerstand_Ohm_Shop*
do we need this attribute in PIM? (problem DISTRELEC-3061 could also be eliminated)

There are several descriptions:
- shortdescription_ir
- shortdescription_shop
- shortdescription_shop_displayed
As far as I know, we only use shortdescription_shop_displayed. Hence, shortdescription_ir and shortdescription_shop could be skipped. Right?

There are several UNSPSC and ECLASS attributes:
- unspsc3
- unspsc5
- unspsc70901
- unspsc8
- unspsc11
- unspsc13
- unspsc13_1
- unspsc_Unilever
- eclass40
- eclass41
- eclass50
- eclass51
- eclass60
- eclass62
- eclass70
- eclass71
Do we really need all these (old) versions. Please check the customer configuration and try to eliminate some old attributes.

Agreed with David at the phone... the following attributes can be skipped during import:
- Widerstand_Ohm_Shop
- Widerstand_Ohm_Shop_Text
- shortdescription_ir
- shortdescription_shop

David will double-check with Oliver Sauter (by e-mail) which UNSPSC/ECLASS attributes can be removed.
